thumb.title: 【睡眠用BGM・環境音】 - 水中 / BGM and environmental sounds for sleep - Underwater
thumb.description: 睡眠用BGM・環境音です。寝るときにでも、聴いてみてください。時間は長いですよ。素材は以下から使わせていただきました。画像 Pexelsでのcottonbro studioによる写真https://www.pexels.com/ja-jp/photo/6328151/ 音 WATRUndwtr_Splash Underwater With Underwater Whirlpool_EMhttps://freesound.org/s/706078/ 作成に使用したソフトApowerEdithttps://www.apowersoft.jp/video-editor--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------This is background music and environmental sounds for sleep.You can listen to it when you go to sleep.The time is long.The material was used from the following.Images Photo by cottonbro studio at Pexelshttps://www.pexels.com/ja-jp/photo/6328151/ Sound WATRUndwtr_Splash Underwater With Underwater Whirlpool_EMhttps://freesound.org/s/706078/ Software used for creationApowerEdithttps://www.apowersoft.jp/video-editor
